mapper.select: SELECT smb_seq, smb_id, smb_pw, smb_level, smb_ip, smb_use, smb_create, smb_update FROM shop.s_member ORDER BY smb_seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop.s_member (smb_id, smb_pw, smb_level, smb_ip, smb_use, smb_create, smb_update) VALUES (#{smbId}, #{smbPw}, #{smbLevel}, #{smbIp}, #{smbUse}, Now(), Now())
